Generated Narrative: ValueSet cancer-stage-grading-vs

This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include codes fromhttp://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 1222598000 (American Joint Committee on Cancer clinical grade allowable value)
  • Include codes fromhttp://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 1222599008 (American Joint Committee on Cancer pathological grade allowable value (qualifier value))

name: CancerStageGradingVS
title: Cancer Stage Grading: Snomed CT
description: Identifying codes based on the timing of classification for stage group observations.
